remarks: Deduction used to change bound variables, using implicit substitition, particularly useful in conjunction with ~ dvelim .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 30-Dec-2017.)
statement:
cbvexdh.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
cbvexdh.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> A. y ps ) ) $.
cbvexdh.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
cbvexdh $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps <-> E. y ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
